par.text: Zinc is used for coating metals ('galvanising'). It is also an important component of alloys, such as brass - an alloy of copper and zinc; and 'new silver' - an alloy of copper, zinc and silver. Zinc oxide - ZnO - is used as a pigment and in pharmacy as a component of ointments. Zinc chloride - ZnC
is used in the preservation of wood.
